data.title: Book Creator app
data.meta_description: Teachers love it. Students love it. Book Creator is the simplest, most inclusive way to create content in the classroom.
data.text:
Book Creator’s Favorite Page Templates

Discover why our team loves these page templates and how they can transform your classroom experience.

Read more

Discover the Power of Page Templates

Explore over 800 ready-made templates designed for K-12 classrooms, making it easier for teachers and students to create engaging digital books.

Read more

Ambassador Spotlight: Dr. Rachelle Dené Poth

Discover the innovative teaching methods of Dr. Rachelle Deńe Poth, a Spanish and STEAM educator with over 25 years of experience.

Read more

Make Back-to-School Night accessible for all with Book Creator

Make your Back-to-School Night accessible, inclusive, and available year-round to foster better communication and build stronger relationships with your school community.

Read more

Welcoming multilingual newcomers: five strategies to start the year right

Discover five effective strategies to welcome multilingual newcomers in your classroom this Back to School season.

Read more

How to use the PD guide for facilitators: getting started with Book Creator

Deliver engaging and effective PD sessions for educators with Book Creator’s comprehensive and remixable PD guide, featuring insights from top trainers, tips for planning successful sessions, and adaptable formats for various training needs.

Read more

Join the Book Creator community: empower your teaching journey

Join over 1,300 educators worldwide and gain access to creative teaching ideas, global networking, platform development contributions, exclusive rewards, and early access to new features.

Read more

Explore the fantastic features we’ve released this year

Discover the fantastic new features Book Creator released this year, from easier classroom management and LMS integration to support for multilingual learners and student portfolios.

Read more

Ideas for starting the new school year

Whether you’re a Book Creator veteran or a novice – here are some ideas and concepts to help you get the most out of Book Creator in the coming school year.

Read more

Mastering the 5E Science Model with Book Creator

Discover how the 5E model of Science Instruction can transform your teaching with a Book Creator template to help you get started.

Read more

Feature update: Create student portfolios in Book Creator

New feature allows students to create their own portfolio of books that stay with them as they progress through the grades.

Read more

Flipgrid Fans – Welcome to Book Creator!

Book Creator can’t replace Flipgrid, but we can help continue the mission of elevating student voices everywhere. Here’s how.

Read more

Partner Spotlight – Escola Eleva São Paolo

This case study demonstrates how a school can quickly roll out Book Creator by embedding it into every curriculum area. There are some fantastic example books to behold here!

Read more

Partner Spotlight: Parkside Specialist School, New Zealand

This case study shines a light on the amazing work that Parkside Special School is doing with students who have profound, severe and moderate disabilities.

Read more

End of Year Best Practices for Teachers and Admins

The end of year is fast approaching. This post is your guide to finishing well and making sure you’re prepared for next year – reflecting, sharing, account admin – it’s all here!

Read more

Jump, slide & dive into an adventure this summer with Book Creator!

Learn how our Independent Reading Journal not only combats learning loss, but actually reinforces higher level knowledge-building skills.

Read more

Exciting, engaging ideas to end the school year

Let’s finish the year in creative style! We’re arming you with templates, examples, ideas and more to make the most of the final weeks.

Read more

New: Translate your books in Book Creator!

Translate text, audio, comments, video captions – even whole books! All with one click in Book Creator.

Read more

TWIMA 10 – This Is Me

10 years of TWIMA! To celebrate this milestone, we brought the project back. Did the magic of global storytelling still hold strong? Let’s see!

Read more

Beyond Quizzes: Creative Formative Assessment with Book Creator

Dr. Monica Burns has published an updated version of her book – Using Book Creator for Formative Assessment. Learn innovative ways to check for understanding.

Read more

Implementing Effective STEM Education with Book Creator

In a world increasingly driven by technology and innovation, STEM education stands out as a crucial pathway to securing a promising future for our students.

Read more

Standards Met, Creativity Unleashed: Book Creator’s Impact on Literacy Education

In this new book, we demonstrate how Book Creator seamlessly integrates with the K-5 Common Core Literacy Standards.

Read more

What is Be An Author Month?

Be An Author Month happens in March every year—a whole month dedicated to inspiring every student to embrace their creativity, articulate their thoughts, and harness the strength of their voice.

Read more

Improve your workflows – LMS assignments, grading and more with Book Creator

With our latest feature update – you can create assignments, turn in work, and view student books all from your LMS! *Plus – view libraries across the district. **PLUS – coming soon… Central Libraries.

Read more

Plan the year ahead with Book Creator (2024)

There’s a lot going on this year! We’ve put together a handy guide to help you plan ahead and get the most out of Book Creator in the months to come. Plus check out our new Monthly Activity Journal!

Read more

Ambassador Spotlight: Janet Burnett — Pioneering the integration of tech in teaching

Janet Burnett has a special place because of her dedication to blending technology with learning. Janet’s heart is in teaching, but she’s equally enthusiastic about how technology can enrich learning. One tool she’s particularly fond of is Book Creator, which aligns well with her vision for education.

Read more

Computer Science Education Week 4-10 December

We’re celebrating #CSEdWeek this year with some ideas and resources that you might not have considered.

Read more

Diving into Phonics: Get our new Digraphs and Vowel Teams templates

A quick recap of what phonics is, and how digraphs and vowel teams relate to phonics. When you’re done, grab our templates!

Read more

New feature – assign a book to your students

This update makes it easier to assign lessons to your students in Book Creator. Just click and share!

Read more

Enhance Literacy Skills with Book Creator: Mastering the 5 Pillars of Reading

The 5 pillars of literacy are phonemic awareness, phonics, fluency, vocabulary and comprehension. These pillars really come alive when underpinned by the foundations of motivation and access – that’s where Book Creator comes in.

Read more

To Actively Engage Students, Showcase Their Learning with Multimedia

Dr. Beth Holland introduces the final part of our 4 part-series on Creativity – how to get multimedia creative outputs from your learners.

Read more

To Prepare Students for the Future, Unleash their Creativity

There may not be Neopets living in the Motherboard, but there IS endless creativity living in each of your students! Dr. Beth Holland has some ideas on how to unlock that creative potential in learners.

Read more

To Meet Students’ Immediate and Future Learning Needs – Nurture Their Creative Thinking

Do you value creativity but find no place for it in your curriculum? It’s time to rethink that and see how central creativity is to student development.

Read more

The Importance of Rhyming in Phonological Awareness for Early Language Development

Learn why rhyming is so important to developing literacy skills and grab our new Book Creator templates to help teach rhyming in your classroom.

Read more

From A to Zing! Learn the Alphabet with Book Creator

Check out these new student templates available in Book Creator to support foundational literacy, designed by our Head of Literacy Learning, Randi Ahrndt.

Read more

To Inspire Student Creativity, Cultivate a Creative Learning Environment

The first post in this Creativity blog series introduced the broader concept of the 4Ps: Place, Process Person, Product. This one dives into Place.

Read more

The writing process: Unlock your inner author with the 5 step writing process

Unlocking the future of education: How EdTech empowers teachers and students alike – empowering our students and ourselves through technology.

Read more

Who’s who in your classroom: Using Book Creator to build community

Empower your students to get creative whilst getting to know each other – a great idea for the start of the school year.

Read more

Embrace lifelong, AI-proof learning with digital portfolios

Digital portfolios are the key to nurturing skills in learners, connecting with parents, and showcasing student work in a way which simply can’t be done using artificial intelligence. Here’s our guide to making the most of digital portfolios.

Read more
